long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
𝐕𝐢𝐝𝐞𝐨 𝐓𝐮𝐭𝐨𝐫𝐢𝐚𝐥𝐬 on how to use the features available on the extension homepage.

𝐇𝐨𝐰 𝐢𝐬 𝐭𝐡𝐢𝐬 𝐭𝐨𝐨𝐥 𝐝𝐢𝐟𝐟𝐞𝐫𝐞𝐧𝐭 𝐟𝐫𝐨𝐦 𝐨𝐭𝐡𝐞𝐫 𝐓𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐭𝐞𝐫 𝐃𝐦 𝐭𝐨𝐨𝐥𝐬? : https://i.ibb.co/Jkg2C1L/difference-between-twitterprospectingtool-and-otherdmtools.jpg

𝐓𝐨𝐩 7 𝐫𝐞𝐚𝐬𝐨𝐧𝐬 𝐩𝐞𝐨𝐩𝐥𝐞 𝐠𝐞𝐭 𝐦𝐨𝐫𝐞 𝐫𝐞𝐬𝐩𝐨𝐧𝐬𝐞 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐦𝐚𝐤𝐞 𝐦𝐨𝐫𝐞 𝐬𝐚𝐥𝐞𝐬 𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝐓𝐰𝐢𝐭𝐭𝐞𝐫 (𝐗) 𝐏𝐫𝐨𝐬𝐩𝐞𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐭𝐨𝐨𝐥.

𝟏.  Mass message Twitter profiles with 𝗭𝗲𝗿𝗼 𝗿𝗶𝘀𝗸 of your account getting banned, and with perfectly personalized greeting lines that increases reply rates.

Spin tax messages while retaining core message with Ai to prevent spam detection.

Smart greeting logic (uses “Hi” if profile name and username of user isn’t human-like). 

Harder to guess it was automated, which increases response rates.


𝟐. Follow up users who are yet to reply your Dms. Remember ?  " The fortune is in the follow-up. "


𝟑. Interact with user tweets (like tweets, reply tweets) before messaging to increase response rates.


𝟒. Add messaged Twitter profiles to a Google Sheet, enabling you to continue the messaging process on any device without messaging people who have already been messaged on a different device.

Useful for teams to avoid repeatedly messaging the same individuals.


𝟓. Filter scrapped leads based on preferred criteria or with Ai.


𝟔. Save all your messaging scripts and quickly copy them while chatting with prospects with just a button click, and Chat with prospects using Ai.
 

𝟕. Get comprehensive information summary about each prospect who replies your message, based on their bio, tweets, and retweets, enabling you to adjust your messaging to each prospect personality. 


Ready to start getting more responses and making more sales in your twitter cold outreach ?  Install this extension now!
